name: R-GAME - advanced game controller
description:
R-GAME - advanced game controller with vehicles support by Wiktor N

advanced game controller with vehicles support

It is recommended to play in full screen.

SPRINT: SHIFT JUMP: SPACE  (+ MOVE)
SHOW BUTTONS "QUIT" AND RESET: ESC SHOW  TOP SCORE: TAB GET OUT OF  THE VEHICLE: SPACE POWERS (IF UNLOCKED): AIMING: RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
FLY: F (+ MOVE) FASTER FLY: F + SHIFT
